Desert World.Description: A pitiless planet of searing heat, blowing sand, and sunbaked rock.

Furnace World.Description: A planet with relentless volcanic activity, wreathed in fire and ash.

Grave World.Description: A once-thriving world—now a grim monument to a fallen civilization.

Ice World.Description: A rugged, frozen world—locked in an unending winter.

Jovian World.Description: A massive planet with vast layers of dense gasses surrounding a small rocky core.

Jungle World.Description: A humid, rain-soaked planet which keeps its secrets under a thick canopy of vegetation.

Ocean World.Description: A planet completely or mostly covered by a boundless ocean.

Rocky World.Description: A rugged planet scarred by eons of destructive asteroid impacts.

Tainted World.Description: A foul planet wracked by a poisonous climate and virulent growths.

Vital World.Description: This diverse, life-bearing planet might provide some small measure of hope.
